title: North America
body: why is there no french language in north american server. was just wondering cause alot of people speak french and we would love having a french interface in the game in french, thank u

replies.body:
I have outlined below the approximate location of the NA region's playerbase:

https://i.imgur.com/ZxTDZ5q.png[]

And now some numbers. French speakers:

In Canada: 7.2 million
In America: 1.2 million

English speakers:

In Canada: 28 million
In America: 231 million

Either way, you're free to speak whatever language you want - just don't expect most people to understand you if you use an uncommon one.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

And in case you're wondering, there are 41 million Spanish speakers in America. If Riot adds any language to their NA client, it would probably be Spanish. But I think a lot of those people _also_ speak English, just as you do, so there wouldn't be much point to such a change, would there.
